p: Bauer, Caroline, in the matter of Habeas Corpus

Caline Bauer by her attorney petitioned court to inquire into her imprisonment & sanity; her husband John James Bauer had her committed to St. Vincent's Institution for the insane located on 9th street; sister Mary Julia Superioress of institution; divorce case between Caroline & John pending also spelled Jean Jacques Bauer; doctor certificates of insanity included
Plaintiff Attorney: Bush, William; Gottschal K. Louis
